title: Blended Education Program for Improving Nursing Students' Self-Regulated Learning Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational self-regulated learning concepts and experience in nursing curriculum development
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment centered on smartphone-based learning activities, with practical tasks and online surveys to diagnose self-regulated learning abilities and develop improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their learning competencies using the Self-Directed Learning Ability Rating Scale (SDLARS-K)
Learners can analyze factors influencing self-regulated learning, including academic achievement and residential environments
Learners can apply self-regulation strategies (goal setting, time management, resource utilization) to actual studies in blended online/offline environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
